summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1377, for the improvement of the alley in Block Fourteen (14), Capitol Hill Addition to the City of Seattle, Division No. 2 being the alley as described in Ordinance No. 15107, by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation, including such grading as may be necessary and the construction of all water mains and sewers, and other appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 15107 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
